MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the PA16 postcode area of Greenock, affecting properties in Angus Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:27pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because we have located an underground cable fault at Angus Road substation and are awaiting additional specialist resources to arrive on site and we will now be working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:59 PM on Sunday, 20 December 2020
